challenges.title: Vector Input & Sum
challenges.description: Read N and then N integers into a vector, and print their sum.

challenges.title: Count Greater Than X
challenges.description: Given N, a vector of N integers and a value X, count how many elements are strictly greater than X.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers. Third line: X.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: count of elements > X.
